bibl.title: Letter from Margaret H. Lower to Emilie L. Reed, April 8, 1930

div1.p: Lower thanks Emilie Reed for her promised gift of a cross and vases for the nearly completed chapel at Walter Reed Hospital.

April 8th., 1930. Mrs. Walter Reed,
The Burlington Hotel,
Washington, D. C.
Dear Mrs. Reed:

General Darnall has just spoken to me of your
letter to him and I hasten to reply.

Indeed your gift of vases and cross for the
altar was almost the first gift to the Chapel. Now that our
dream is about to be realized you can plan to get them most
any time as we hope to be using the Chapel early next year.
It is going to be a gem and I know your gift in memory of your
distinguished husband will add greatly to its beauty.
With every good wish, I am,

Most sincerely,
(Miss) MARGARET H. LOWER,
VICE CHAIRMAN.
